|action2=GTC |action2date=16:09, 11 September 2015 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Battleships of Italy/archive1 |action2result=promoted
|ftname=Battleships of Italy |currentstatus=GA |topic=warfare }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPMILHIST|class=GA|Maritime=yes|Italian=yes|WWII=yes|OMT=1}} {{WikiProject Ships|class=GA}} }}
== Class name ==
''Conway's'' gives the name as simply "''Caracciolo''-class", <s>and I believe ''Jane's'' does as well</s>. Is the "full ship name" or the "shortened name" the more [[WP:COMMONNAME|common]] one? - [[User:The Bushranger|The Bushranger]] <sub><font color="maroon">[[User talk:The Bushranger|One ping only]]</font></sub> 19:07, 21 March 2013 (UTC)
:Stille's [http://books.google.com/books?id=djIn3KTOaWoC&pg=PA7&dq=Francesco+Caracciolo+battleship&hl=en&sa=X&ei=uV5LUdGdBqbhyQGbsoCICA&ved=0CDAQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=Francesco%20Caracciolo%20battleship&f=false ''Italian Battleships of World War II''], Whitley's [http://books.google.com/books?id=YsEBzbYx8lEC&pg=PA169&dq=Francesco+Caracciolo+battleship&hl=en&sa=X&ei=uV5LUdGdBqbhyQGbsoCICA&ved=0CD0Q6AEwAg#v=onepage&q=Francesco%20Caracciolo%20battleship&f=false ''Battleships of World War II''], Garzke's & Dulin's [http://books.google.com/books?id=TAyRtKKRR_cC&pg=PT389&dq=Francesco+Caracciolo+battleship&hl=en&sa=X&ei=uV5LUdGdBqbhyQGbsoCICA&ved=0CEMQ6AEwAw ''Axis and Neural Battleships of World War II''], and Jane's [http://books.google.com/books?ei=uV5LUdGdBqbhyQGbsoCICA&id=OSxHAAAAYAAJ&dq=Francesco+Caracciolo+battleship&q=Francesco+Caracciolo#search_anchor ''Jane's Battleships of the 20th Century''] all use the full name. [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 19:29, 21 March 2013 (UTC) ::That's good enough for me. I will now go shake a stick at ''Conway's'' for being [[Monty Python|very silly]]! - [[User:The Bushranger|The Bushranger]] <sub><font color="maroon">[[User talk:The Bushranger|One ping only]]</font></sub> 19:41, 21 March 2013 (UTC)
